title: 20 MIN PILATES CORE & ABS WORKOUT || At-Home Pilates For All Levels
description:
Get ready to work and strengthen your core in this 20 Minute Pilates Core & Abs Workout. This class is a slower paced class designed to cater to all levels, providing lots of different variations depending on where you are in your pilates practice. Whether you are a beginner or a seasoned practitioner, there is something for everyone. I hope you enjoy it! 😊


🌸 Mat from Liforme - https://liforme.com/
Use my code 'MOVEWITHNICOLEYOGA' for a discount.

🤍 INSTAGRAM: @movewithnicole


🎥 Videography by Bodie Rex
♫ Music from https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/n9a93q/





--
DISCLAIMER:
Please consult your doctor or health care professional before starting this workout. If you experience pain or discomfort at any time during this workout, you should stop immediately. By performing these exercises, you do so at your own risk. By using this video, you understand and agree that Move With Nicole will not be held responsible or liable for any injury or loss you may suffer as a result of this workout video.
channelDescription:
Hi, I'm Nicole! 😊 I am a Certified Pilates & Certified Yoga Instructor (RYT 500) with many years of in-studio teaching experience. As a former dancer and gymnast, I have always had a passion for movement and I love being able to share that passion with others. I believe in finding forms of movement that feel good for your body and soul and I hope that through my classes, I can guide you to your best feeling self!

--
I was a professional Latin Ballroom Dancer and taught Ballroom dancing to adults for 7+ years. This is truly where I established my passion for teaching movement. When I retired from competitive dancing in 2017, I began teaching Barre and Pilates in studios and gyms in Sydney.

During COVID lockdown, Dance & Pilates studios closed and that was when I poured my love of teaching into this channel, hoping to help people keep moving and feeling good!

Thank you so much for practicing with me and I hope you enjoy the classes as much as I love creating them for you. 🩷

comments: Sometimes I think you’re actually in the room with me because your prompts and form corrections are always exactly what I need in the moment!
You're not a broken record, Nicole. I appreciate all those reminders. It's one of the many reasons I think you're the best Pilates and Yoga teacher.
Today marks 365 days of moving with Nicole, and a new workout is out today! This is definitely a celebration for me!
Love that you voiced this one!! Your explanation of simplistic things like trying not to pull too hard on your legs and the tightening jeans example really helped enhance this workout!
im so impressed that you were speaking while doing all these exercises as if they were nothing!!! Queen!!!
